name: Phantom Haze
desc: Increase the NPC girls' Hp by 18%, Attack by 14%

name: Flaw Detection
desc: Increase NPC Girls' Immunity by 30%, Extra Control Rate by 30%

name: Parry Practice
desc: Increase NPC Girl's Block Rate by 30%, Precision by 30%

name: Shields Up
desc: Increases your Girls' Block Rate by 30%

name: Sword Practice A
desc: Increase your Angel & Demon Girls' Attack by 18%

name: Sword Practice B
desc: Increase your Ghost & Monster Girls' Attack by 18%

name: Sword Practice C
desc: Increase your Human & Fairy Girls' Attack by 18%

name: Evil Ritual
desc: When battle starts, your girls have 200 Energy.

name: Sanctuary
desc: Prevent 1 lethal damage for your girls

name: Unified Body
desc: Your girls gain 25% Damage Reduce Rate. Whenever a girl takes damage, it will have 50% chance to distribute evenly among all allies.

name: Dual Blade
desc: Whenever an ally performs a Basic Attack, there is 50% chance to perform an additional Basic Attack.

name: Potency Evocation
desc: Increase your Girls' Crit by 25%, Crit Damage by 25%
